SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
The Controller class handles the game logic and manages player actions.

  • Constructor Details

    • Controller

      public Controller(Game model, GameServer server)
      Constructs a new Controller object with the specified Game model and GameServer.
      Parameters:
      model - the Game model to associate with the controller
      server - the GameServer to communicate with

  • Method Details

    • isGameStarted

      public boolean isGameStarted()
      Checks if the game has started.
      Returns:
      true if the game has started, false otherwise

    • addPlayer

      public boolean addPlayer(String username, GameListener listener)
      Adds a player to the game lobby.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player.
      listener - The GameListener for the player.
      Returns:
      true if the lobby is full and the game is ready to start, false otherwise.

    • getListener

      public GameListener getListener(String username) throws UsernameNotFoundException
      Retrieves the GameListener associated with the specified username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player whose GameListener is to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the GameListener associated with the specified username
      Throws:
      UsernameNotFoundException - if the specified username is not found

    • getNumOfActivePlayers

      public int getNumOfActivePlayers()
      Returns the number of active players in the game.
      Returns:
      The number of active players.

    • kick

      public GameListener kick(String username)
      Kicks a player from the game.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player to kick.
      Returns:
      The GameListener object of the kicked player, null if the game is not started yet.

    • reconnect

      public void reconnect(String username, GameListener listener)
      Reconnects a player to the game.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player.
      listener - The GameListener object for the player.

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect(String username)
      Disconnects a player from the game.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player to disconnect.

    • doTurn

      public void doTurn(String username, Coordinates[] chosenTiles, int col)
      Executes a player's turn.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player.
      chosenTiles - The Coordinates of the tiles the player wants to choose.
      col - The column index where the player wants to insert the chosen tiles.
